name: Foxy Go!
description:
This is my first game! Finished this by following several toturials online. Although there were many bugs during the development, I'm very glad when it was completed. Enjoy!

Controls
  • A&D to move
  • S to crouch
  • W or Space to jump
  • E to enter the house
  • F to shot
Credits
  • art: ansimuz
